description: A bit of a long hike to get to a simple mountain, but I went in winter and the Forest Service Roads were snowed in.The cool thing was that during winter with snowshoes I had to blaze my own trail. So the GPS track is not always on the existing trail.Toilets. Need Northwest Forest Pass to park.
directions: Exit 47 on I90, go North, turn Left (West) on access road and park in large 'Pratt Lake Trailhead' lot.
title: Pratt Mountain
